DocAttribute.Name: SlippageX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slippage in x-direction of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.

DocAttribute.Name: SlippageY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slippage in y-direction of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.

DocAttribute.Name: SlippageZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slippage in z-direction of the coordinate system defined by the instance which uses this resource object.
